text.value: Keep up to date with the latest improvements in ToolJet!

schema.value:
{{queries.080cf416-bcc4-4131-97b9-6a058833e1b5.data
    .filter(note => components.eff732f5-fb34-4a16-a1e5-c38e0e376ed4.value || note.is_lts)
    .sort((a, b) => a.tag.localeCompare(b.tag))
    .filter((option, index, self) => index === self.findIndex((t) => t.tag === option.tag))
    .map(option => ({
        label: option.tag,
        value: option.tag,
        disable: false,
        visible: true,
        default: option.tag === 'v3.0.1-ee-lts' 
    }))}}
